page.title: 06CLUB
page.content: THE YOUTH CLUB MEETS IN STRATHMARTINE PRIMARY SCHOOL IN THE HALL EVERY WEDNESDAY DURING THE SESSION OF OCTOBER TILL MAY.THEY MEET AT 7PM _8.30PM AND ANYONE FROM THE AGE OF 5_16 FROM THE LOCAL COMMUNITY CAN JOIN.THE FOLLOWING ARE SOME OF THE ACTIVITIES. PARTIES: EASTER_WITH BONNETS AND EGGS CHRISTMAS_PARTY HALLOWEEN_WITH TREACLE SCONES,APPLES AND FANCY DRESS BONFIRE NIGHT_WITH SOUP SAUSAGE ROLLS AND FIREWORKS CHINESE NIGHT_WITH WOK COOKING,KITE MAKING,AND DRESSED AS CHINESE 60'S ROCK AND ROLL NIGHT_DANCE AND DRESS IN 60'S STYLE GAMES: TABLE TENNIS,TABLEFOOTBALL AND SOFTBALL
